titles.title: Tribal Transportation Equity and Transparency Improvement Act of 2020
Tribal Transportation Equity and Transparency Improvement Act of 2020
Tribal Transportation Equity and Transparency Improvement Act of 2020
A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to modify the distribution of funds under the tribal transportation program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
